com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class AccountChooser.SelectAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.AccountChooser.SelectAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    AccountChooser

    class AccountChooser.SelectAccount
extends java.lang.Thread
    Start a background thread that pops up a user dialog, then blocks until the user has selected an account.
